alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Gallia, Lawrence, southwestern Mason, Cabell, southwestern Putnam, north central Lincoln and north central Wayne Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Lake Vesuvius to near Huntington. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Lake Vesuvius, Hurricane, Barboursville, Milton, Ceredo, Ona, Culloden, Vernon, Waterloo, Burlington, Aid, Crown City, Athalia, Henderson and Ashton. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 3 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
